title: F6: Developer ecosystem
description: How can we create a positive developer experience that helps the developer focus on building successful apps?

title: F6: DApps & Integrations
description: What applications will provide the most value for end users in 2021?

title: F6: Distributed decision making
description: How can we help the Catalyst community to get better at distributed decision making within the next two Catalyst rounds?

title: F6: Proposer outreach
description: How can we encourage entrepreneurs from outside the Cardano ecosystem to submit proposals to Catalyst in the next two funds?

title: F6: Catalyst value onboarding
description: How can we encourage meaningful participation in Project Catalyst from community members in the next two funds?

title: F6: Metadata challenge
description: How can we utilize transaction metadata to solve real world problems?

title: F6: Grow Africa, Grow Cardano
description: How do we seed and grow Cardano in Africa?

title: F6: Scale-UP Cardano's DeFi Ecosystem
description: How can we encourage DeFi teams to build/deploy open finance solutions on Cardano in the next 6 months?

title: F6: Cardano Emerging Threat Alarm
description: How can we help stakeholders identify serious emerging systemic threats for the Cardano blockchain before a threat overcomes the system?

title: F6: Multilingual resources
description: How can we motivate non english speakers to learn and grow Cardano ecosystem in the next 3-6 months?

title: F6: DeFi and Microlending for Africa
description: How can we enable the creation of micro-lending and Defi dApp solutions that fits the African setting?

title: F6: DLT Entrepreneurship Toolbox
description: How can early stage entrepreneurs develop their skills to execute & communicate great ideas so voters/stakeholders value the project?

title: F6: Partnerships for Global Adoption
description: How can Cardano enter in global partnerships with United Nations Development Programme and World Bank Group, to leverage mass adoption?

title: F6: NFT Business models
description: What non-Art use cases of NFTs can distinguish Cardano as the blockchain of choice for NFT based businesses?

title: F6: Atala PRISM DID Mass-Scale Adoption
description: What will drive mass-scale adoption of decentralized IDs on Cardano?

title: F6: Disaster: When all is at stake
description: How can we help SPOs tackle risks & plan, develop and participate in disaster recovery tests in a safe hiccup-free and decentralized manner?

title: F6: Scale-UP Cardano's Community Hubs
description: How do we encourage Local Community Hubs to drive adoption and awareness of Cardano in the next 6 months?

title: F6: Improve and Grow Auditability
description: How to make the auditing process of funded proposals efficient, distributed and transparent?

title: F6: Fund7 challenge setting
description: What Challenges should the community prioritize to address in Fund7?
